about_the_game: With bankruptcy threatening the family auto repair business, a retired car chopper picks up one last job to provide for his family. Cop Hartmoore and his daughter, Cherry, own a failing auto shop during the recession of 2008. Upon receiving notice that the family business will go into foreclosure, Cop slips into depression leaving Cherry to manage the garage’s daily operations. To make ends meet, Cherry enters an illegal Gymkhana street race. Learning of his daughter’s risky activities and fearing she will continue racing, Cop turns to Donald (aka Dozer the Plow), a former employer with a bloody past. Looking to take advantage of a desperate man, Donald agrees to loan Cop the money if he chops one last car. Bullets fly and secrets are revealed as the past comes back to haunt our heroes. Starring Adrienne Fischer, Thomas Mirth, Philip Bower, and Chad Conley.

short_description: Cop and Cherry Hartmoore operate an auto performance garage in a depressed economy. In desperation to make ends meet, Cherry enters an illegal rally race to pay off some of the business’s debt. After learning of Cherry's race, Cop fears for the safety of his only daughter and thus turns to an old employer with a bloody history for help.
